description: Housed in a smart hotel, this modern and minimalist-style restaurant boasts large picture windows which allow guests to enjoy some of the most beautiful sunsets in the region, either from the dining room or perhaps while sipping an aperitif in the lounge bar. The new chef serves contemporary Mediterranean cuisine with the occasional international influence, in which his creative flair is enhanced by expertly applied modern techniques. Good wine selection.
